channel.title: Authors on Jiri Stodulka
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Jiri Stodulka

item.description:
I am a Data Scientist with a master’s degree in Applied Economics. Currently, I work as a full-time data scientist at SGS & Co and facilitate transformation towards AI and ML. Working with text and graphical data, I am personally responsible for R&D of various ML features and solutions in production.

With Aggregate Intellect, I facilitate discussion groups about various topics in AI and contribute to open-source. With Sharpest minds, I offer 1-on-1 mentorship with aspiring ML/Data Scientist!
